Text saved: Street art is art that people make outside. They make it on walls in cities.

In the 1990s, there was still graffiti. But street art also became very popular. It was popular all over the world.

Some artists wanted to share their ideas. They made art about big problems, like war. They wanted people to think about these things. Other artists were different. They just wanted to make beautiful art. They wanted their work to look nice.

In South America, many artists worked in poor places. The city walls there were grey. The artists added colour and life to the walls. They made the walls beautiful.
